item.title: [sld] Hall of the Bandit Lord
item.description:
Legendary Land

Hall of the Bandit Lord enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}, Pay 3 life: Add {C}. If that mana is spent on a creature spell, it gains haste.

item.title: [sld] Ajani, Mentor of Heroes
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Ajani

+1: Distribute three +1/+1 counters among one, two, or three target creatures you control.

+1: Look at the top four cards of your library. You may reveal an Aura, creature, or planeswalker card from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

−8: You gain 100 life.

item.title: [sld] Sorin, Grim Nemesis
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Sorin

+1: Reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. Each opponent loses life equal to its mana value.

−X: Sorin, Grim Nemesis deals X damage to target creature or planeswalker and you gain X life.

−9: Create a number of 1/1 black Vampire Knight creature tokens with lifelink equal to the highest life total among all players.

item.title: [sld] Tamiyo, the Moon Sage
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Tamiyo

+1: Tap target permanent. It doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

−2: Draw a card for each tapped creature target player controls.

−8: You get an emblem with "You have no maximum hand size" and "Whenever a card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, you may return it to your hand."

item.title: [sld] Ashiok, Dream Render
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Ashiok

Spells and abilities your opponents control can't cause their controller to search their library.

−1: Target player mills four cards. Then exile each opponent's graveyard.

item.title: [sld] Angrath, the Flame-Chained
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Angrath

+1: Each opponent discards a card and loses 2 life.

−3: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step if it has mana value 3 or less.

−8: Each opponent loses life equal to the number of cards in their graveyard.

item.title: [sld] Brain Freeze
item.description:
Instant

Target player mills three cards.

Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)

item.title: [sld] Snap
item.description:
Instant

Return target creature to its owner's hand. Untap up to two lands.

item.title: [sld] Bribery
item.description:
Sorcery

Search target opponent's library for a creature card and put that card onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles.

item.title: [sld] Unmask
item.description:
Sorcery

You may exile a black card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost.

Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

item.title: [sld] Shadow of Doubt
item.description:
Instant

({U/B} can be paid with either {U} or {B}.)

Players can't search libraries this turn.

Draw a card.

item.title: [sld] Kira, Great Glass-Spinner
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Spirit

Flying

Creatures you control have "Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability for the first time each turn, counter that spell or ability."

item.title: [sld] Hokori, Dust Drinker
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Spirit

Lands don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.

At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player untaps a land they control.

item.title: [sld] Eidolon of the Great Revel
item.description:
Enchantment Creature — Spirit

Whenever a player casts a spell with mana value 3 or less, Eidolon of the Great Revel deals 2 damage to that player.

item.title: [sld] Elvish Spirit Guide
item.description:
Creature — Elf Spirit

Exile Elvish Spirit Guide from your hand: Add {G}.

item.title: [sld] Plains
item.description:
Basic Land — Plains

({T}: Add {W}.)

item.description:
Basic Land — Swamp

({T}: Add {B}.)

item.description:
Basic Land — Island

({T}: Add {U}.)

item.title: [sld] Mountain
item.description:
Basic Land — Mountain

({T}: Add {R}.)

item.title: [sld] Forest
item.description:
Basic Land — Forest

({T}: Add {G}.)

item.title: [sld] Windbrisk Heights
item.description:
Land

Hideaway (This land enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom of your library.)

{T}: Add {W}.

{W}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if you attacked with three or more creatures this turn.

item.title: [sld] Shelldock Isle
item.description:
Land

Hideaway (This land enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom of your library.)

{T}: Add {U}.

{U}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if a library has twenty or fewer cards in it.

item.title: [sld] Spinerock Knoll
item.description:
Land

Hideaway (This land enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom of your library.)

{T}: Add {R}.

{R}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if an opponent was dealt 7 or more damage this turn.

item.title: [sld] Howltooth Hollow
item.description:
Land

Hideaway (This land enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom of your library.)

{T}: Add {B}.

{B}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if each player has no cards in hand.

item.title: [sld] Mosswort Bridge
item.description:
Land

Hideaway (This land enters the battlefield tapped. When it does, look at the top four cards of your library, exile one face down, then put the rest on the bottom of your library.)

{T}: Add {G}.

{G}, {T}: You may play the exiled card without paying its mana cost if creatures you control have total power 10 or greater.

item.title: [sld] Swords to Plowshares
item.description:
Instant

Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.

item.title: [sld] Solve the Equation
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for an instant or sorcery card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [sld] Idyllic Tutor
item.description:
Sorcery

Search your library for an enchantment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

item.title: [sld] Praetor's Grasp
item.description:
Sorcery

Search target opponent's library for a card and exile it face down. Then that player shuffles. You may look at and play that card for as long as it remains exiled.

item.title: [sld] Veil of Summer
item.description:
Instant

Draw a card if an opponent has cast a blue or black spell this turn. Spells you control can't be countered this turn. You and permanents you control gain hexproof from blue and from black until end of turn. (You and they can't be the targets of blue or black spells or abilities your opponents control.)

item.description:
Basic Land — Island

({T}: Add {U}.)

item.title: [sld] Battlefield Forge
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Add {R} or {W}. Battlefield Forge deals 1 damage to you.

item.description:
Basic Land — Plains

({T}: Add {W}.)

item.description:
Basic Land — Forest

({T}: Add {G}.)

item.description:
Basic Land — Swamp

item.title: [sld] Persistent Petitioners
item.description:
Creature — Human Advisor

{1}, {T}: Target player mills a card.

Tap four untapped Advisors you control: Target player mills twelve cards.

A deck can have any number of cards named Persistent Petitioners.

item.title: [pl22] Temur Sabertooth
item.description:
Creature — Cat

{1}{G}: You may return another creature you control to its owner's hand. If you do, Temur Sabertooth gains indestructible until end of turn.

item.title: [pl22] Jedit Ojanen
item.description: Legendary Creature — Cat Warrior

item.title: [pl22] Yuriko, the Tiger's Shadow
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Ninja

Commander ninjutsu {U}{B} ({U}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand or the command zone tapped and attacking.)

Whenever a Ninja you control deals combat damage to a player, reveal the top card of your library and put that card into your hand. Each opponent loses life equal to that card's mana value.

item.title: [pl22] Snapdax, Apex of the Hunt
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Dinosaur Cat Nightmare

Mutate {2}{B/R}{W}{W} (If you cast this spell for its mutate cost, put it over or under target non-Human creature you own. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)

Double strike

Whenever this creature mutates, it deals 4 damage to target creature or planeswalker an opponent controls and you gain 4 life.

item.title: [pl22] Herald's Horn
item.description:
Artifact

As Herald's Horn enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.

Creature spells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast.

At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. If it's a creature card of the chosen type, you may reveal it and put it into your hand.

item.title: [sld] Mountain
item.description:
Basic Land — Mountain

({T}: Add {R}.)

item.title: [nec] Armed and Armored
item.description:
Instant

Vehicles you control become artifact creatures until end of turn. Choose a Dwarf you control. Attach any number of Equipment you control to it.

item.title: [nec] Aeronaut Admiral
item.description:
Creature — Human Pilot

Flying

Vehicles you control have flying.

item.title: [nec] Indomitable Archangel
item.description:
Creature — Angel

Flying

Metalcraft — Artifacts you control have shroud as long as you control three or more artifacts. (An artifact with shroud can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

item.title: [nec] Generous Gift
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Elephant creature token.

item.title: [nec] Dispatch
item.description:
Instant

Tap target creature.

Metalcraft — If you control three or more artifacts, exile that creature.

item.title: [nec] Crush Contraband
item.description:
Instant

Choose one or both —

• Exile target artifact.

• Exile target enchantment.

item.title: [nec] Cataclysmic Gearhulk
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

Vigilance

When Cataclysmic Gearhulk enters the battlefield, each player chooses an artifact, a creature, an enchantment, and a planeswalker from among the nonland permanents they control, then sacrifices the rest.

item.title: [nec] Swords to Plowshares
item.description:
Instant

Exile target creature. Its controller gains life equal to its power.
